Spherica® particle technology for tomorrow's innovations

We supply high precision microparticles enabling reliable solutions and greener alternatives for applications within electronics and solar.

Spherica® polymer particles tailored to your needs

1. Uniform size
Particles have highly uniform size and homogeneous properties
2. Flexibility
Tailored mechanical properties
3. Coating
A wide selection of silver-, gold- and nickel-coated particles

Polymer particle technology

The electronics industry’s preferred designer of microparticles.  Extremely narrow size distribution Conpart can utilize a wide range of chemistry, producing polymer particles with unique properties tailored specifically for each application. This unique technology makes it possible to choose from a wide range of monomers, tuning mechanical properties, chemical stability and surface properties, at the same time maintaining spheres with unmatched size distribution and reproducibility. This makes Conpart’s particle technology state-of-the-art within electronics field.

Our products

Uniform distribution of plastic particles with unified particle size In additional to use in automobile parts

Spherica®
Ag series

Silver-coated particles for Isotropic Conductive Adhesive (ICA or ECA)

Spherica®
Au & Ni series

Nickel&gold coated particles for Anisotropic Conductive Adhesive (ACF or ACP)

Spherica®
Ｎseries

Polymer particles without metal coating for gap spacer applications

Applications

Our unique particle technology is harnessed to create high-performance interconnect materials suitable for a diverse range of fields, such as electronics, microsystems, solar energy, and more.
